text:
January 15, 1965
Mr. Lee E. Campion, Director
The University of the State of New York
The State Education Department
Albany 1, New York
Dear Lee,
Your letter of January 12 arrived today. I think your idea of
advertising in the NAEB newsletter for possible speakers is an excellent
one. Would you like me to write the notice or would you like to take
care of it? Would you like to have the names sent to you? Are you
compiling the speaker's information sheet?
I'll be interested in learning Harold Hill's reaction to this proposal.
With every good wish.
Marion Corwell
Associate Director
MC/hjk
